ivardefs.name: conditionalCreate
ivardefs.desc: A flag that indicates that the server supports conditional create.

ivardefs.name: conditionalDelete
ivardefs.desc: A code that indicates how the server supports conditional delete.

ivardefs.name: conditionalRead
ivardefs.desc: A code that indicates how the server supports conditional read.

ivardefs.name: conditionalUpdate
ivardefs.desc: A flag that indicates that the server supports conditional update.

ivardefs.name: documentation
ivardefs.desc: Additional information about the resource type used by the system.

ivardefs.name: interaction_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies a restful operation supported by the solution.

ivardefs.name: operation_
ivardefs.desc: Definition of an operation or a named query together with its parameters and their meaning and type. Consult the definition of the operation for details about how to invoke the operation, and the parameters.

ivardefs.name: profile
ivardefs.desc: A specification of the profile that describes the solution's overall support for the resource, including any constraints on cardinality, bindings, lengths or other limitations. See further discussion in [Using Profiles](profiling.html#profile-uses).

ivardefs.name: readHistory
ivardefs.desc: A flag for whether the server is able to return past versions as part of the vRead operation.

ivardefs.name: referencePolicy_
ivardefs.desc: A set of flags that defines how references are supported.

ivardefs.name: searchInclude_
ivardefs.desc: A list of _include values supported by the server.

ivardefs.name: searchParam_
ivardefs.desc: Search parameters for implementations to support and/or make use of - either references to ones defined in the specification, or additional ones defined for/by the implementation.

ivardefs.name: searchRevInclude_
ivardefs.desc: A list of _revinclude (reverse include) values supported by the server.

ivardefs.name: supportedProfile_
ivardefs.desc: A list of profiles that represent different use cases supported by the system. For a server, "supported by the system" means the system hosts/produces a set of resources that are conformant to a particular profile, and allows clients that use its services

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: A type of resource exposed via the restful interface.

ivardefs.name: updateCreate
ivardefs.desc: A flag to indicate that the server allows or needs to allow the client to create new identities on the server (that is, the client PUTs to a location where there is no existing resource). Allowing this operation means that the server allows the client to

ivardefs.name: versioning
ivardefs.desc: This field is set to no-version to specify that the system does not support (server) or use (client) versioning for this resource type. If this has some other value, the server must at least correctly track and populate the versionId meta-property on reso

properties.desc: A specification of the restful capabilities of the solution for a specific resource type.
